Milestones.Caption: Leonardo da Vinci
Milestones.Body: Leonardo da Vinci was born out of woodlock in Vinci (17 miles west of Florence) being edited

Milestones.Caption: Leonardo Moves to Florence
Milestones.Body: When 12, his mother in law and grandfather died. Feeling alone and lonely he moves to Florence. Not true at all

Milestones.Caption: Adoration of the Magi
Milestones.Body: When 29, Leonardo starts working on Adoration of the Magi.

Milestones.Caption: Leonardo Moves to Milan
Milestones.Body: When 30, Leonardo moves to Milan and spends the next 17 years there.

Milestones.Caption: Leonardo does body dissection
Milestones.Body: When 58, he does dissections to learn about muscles. Before this, his drawings were not correct about muscles, but after this he goes back and perfects them.
